name: BlipSleep
description:
In one black, black forest stood a black, black house. In this black, black house, there was a black, black room. There was a black, black bed in a black, black room. On this black, black bed, a black, black man was sleeping. Black, black monsters were flying around this black, black room.

wasd - move

space - ability

Try to collect as many Z letters as possible
